entry.title: RT Derked: I've spent the last week or so diving heavily into the Solana development eco. I've found docs around things I've wanted to do pretty spars...
entry.summary: RT Derked I've spent the last week or so diving heavily into the Solana development eco. I've found docs around things I've wanted to do pretty sparse in some places, so I've started to compile a repo with practical examples and some notes.

entry.summary:
Jamie just aced #30daysoftext and is already in the next competition 😎 Still not sure what #ChainAbstraction is? Then read on! ⏬
Jamiebones: Chain Abstraction in NEAR: Chain abstraction involves simplifying the development and usage of blockchain applications by hiding the underlying complexity of the blockchain infrastructure. #ChainAbstraction @NEARProtocol
